means: 使变质( taint的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Opposition leaders said that the elections had been tainted by corruption.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对派领导人说，选举中存在舞弊现象。

sentence.Network_en: Not a whiff of scandal has ever tainted his private life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的私生活没有爆出过一丁点儿的丑闻。

sentence.Network_en: The administration was tainted with scandal.
sentence.Network_cn: 丑闻使得政府声名狼藉。

entry.tran: 玷污，毁坏，损害，败坏(地位、名誉)
entry.def: If a person or thing is tainted by something bad or undesirable, their status or reputation is harmed because they are associated with it.

example.ex: Opposition leaders said that the elections had been tainted by corruption.
example.tran: 反对派领导人说，选举中存在舞弊现象。

example.ex: ...a series of political scandals that has tainted the political stars of a generation.
example.tran: 令一整代政治明星声名染上污点的一系列政治丑闻

entry.def: A taint is an undesirable quality which spoils the status or reputation of someone or something.

example.ex: Her government never really shook off the taint of corruption...
example.tran: 她的政府从来没有真正摆脱掉腐败的阴影。

example.ex: She could smell the taint of sin in the most innocent of passions.
example.tran: 哪怕是再纯真的恋情她也能从中嗅出罪恶的味道。

entry.def: If an unpleasant substance taints food or medicine, the food or medicine is spoiled or damaged by it.

example.ex: Rancid oil will taint the flavour.
...blood tainted with the AIDS and hepatitis viruses.
example.tran: 被艾滋病毒和肝炎病毒污染的血液

auth_sentence.content: You can't draw effective conclusions from tainted data.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can't draw effective conclusions from tainted data.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can't draw effective conclusions from tainted data.

auth_sentence.content: But we are tainted by the harm we cause.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we are tainted by the harm we cause.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we are tainted by the harm we cause.

auth_sentence.content: Grahame's early years were tainted by tragedy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Grahame's early years were tainted by tragedy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grahame's early years were tainted by tragedy.
